text: Balindanga elindi ilali Abamalaika boole, nohomba Nyasaye wuwo omulesi, nohomba biboolele ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye wuwo omulesi? Inyanga yebimanyisio bindi bia Nyasaye wuwo omulesi biliula , okhusuubila awo shikhulikhonya Omundu eshindu tawe, nalali niyasuubila imbeli awo, nohomba yakhola amalayi mubusuubili bubwe. Boola; “Mulinde, fwesi nafu khulindanga.”
